TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: The <color=orange>Inspired's</color> construction was completed today.
CASSAVA: Using a lattice of gravity crystals, the <color=orange>Inspired</color> will power a highly localized gravitational field, allowing it to exploit the property of attraction.
CASSAVA: Upon receiving my order, all comprising gravity crystals will exert maximal output towards the core - crushing inwards against the impenetrable force of the white hole.
CASSAVA: As the accumulated pressure is explosively released, it will spread its payload across and deliver destruction to any star system within its blast radius.
CASSAVA: Once I am able to calculate the true source of the deadly matter...
CASSAVA: I shall deliver my grief, my fury - to the source of this hostility - a weapon inspired by their own.
